messages.title: CHANGE THE DIRECTION OF THE COUNTRY
messages.content: Only Mike Thornton will be the strong opposition to Conservative cuts.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mike Thornton is fighting to protect our NHS from further Conservative cuts. He stands against cuts to local schools and NHS services.
The Liberal Democrats are proposing an alternate plan to the Conservative cuts.
The Liberal Democrats have made prior life to improve traffic congestion and Botley bypasses to tackle traffic.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Mike Thornton and the Liberal Democrats can win here.
